name: Waves and Gears
description:
This game has been created during the global game jam 2018 (Transmission) with one technical artist and an other 3d artist.

It's a twin-stick-shooter in 1v1 where two robots  try to destroy the other with the waves guns and also, stopped the transmition of the ennemi parabolic antenna. 

Each player have 10 live and on the ground, you can find differents bonus like a triple shoot. But take care, if you take a lot of hit, maybe your opponent can steal it...
